name: Channel 4
goal: Channel 4 is a publicly owned commercially funded UK public service broadcaster, with a statutory remit to be innovative, experimental and distinctive. Channel 4's not-for-profit status ensures that the maximum amount of its revenues are reinvested in the delivery of its public service remit.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights
euInitiatives:
Digital Single Market
Competition and State Aid Policy
Data Protection
Film Policy
Copyright
AVMS Directive
Telecom
